We hosted Xiaomi’s General Manager of Investor Relations and Capital Markets Ran

shared business outlook on major segments in detail including smartphone, AIoT and

and chipset. Management also highlighted key strategic priorities for 2026 which 
include sticking to technology investments with Rmb200bn R&D budget in 2026-30,
